mapper.select: select department_id as id, department_name as name, manager_id as "manager.id", location_id as loc from departments order by department_id asc

select D.department_id as id, D.department_name as name, D.manager_id as "manager.id", M.first_name as "manager.firstName", M.last_name as "manager.lastName", D.location_id as loc from departments D, employees M where D.manager_id = M.employee_id(+) and D.department_id = #{value}
